params.approved: True for an approval, false for a disapproval.
params.forwarder: The account approved or disapproved as forwarder.
params.nonce: The `signer`'s account nonce before the approval change.
params.signer: The account for which `forwarder` is approved or disapproved.

params.data: The content of the call (the signer address will be appended to it according to EIP-2771).
params.signature: Signature by the signer for approving the forwarder.
params.target: The destination of the call (that will receive the meta-transaction).

params.approved: Whether to approve or disapprove (if previously approved) the forwarder.
params.forwarder: The address of the forwarder to change the approval of.

params.approved: Whether to approve or disapprove (if previously approved) the forwarder.
params.signature: Signature by signer for approving forwarder.

params.data: The content of the call (the signer address will be appended to it according to EIP-2771).
params.signature: Signature by the signer for approving the forwarder.
params.target: The destination of the call (that will receive the meta-transaction).

params.data: The content of the call (the signer address will be appended to it according to EIP-2771).
params.target: The destination of the call (that will receive the meta-transaction).

returns.nonce: The current nonce for the `signer`/`forwarder` pair.

returns._0: True if `forwarder` is a meta-transaction forwarder for `signer`, false otherwise.
True if `forwarder` is trusted, false if not.

ForwarderApproved(address,address,bool,u.notice: Emitted when a forwarder is approved or disapproved.

approveAndForward(bytes,uint8,address,by.notice: Approves the forwarder and forwards the meta-transaction.

approveForwarder(address,bool).notice: Approves or disapproves a forwarder for the sender.

approveForwarder(bool,bytes,uint8).notice: Approves or disapproves a forwarder using EIP-2771 (msg.sender is the forwarder and the approval signer is appended to the calldata).

checkApprovalAndForward(bytes,uint8,addr.notice: Checks the signed approval (but does not record it) and forwards the meta-transaction.

forward(address,bytes).notice: Forwards the meta-transaction (assuming the caller has been approved by the signer as a forwarder).

getNonce(address,address).notice: Gets the current nonce for the signer/forwarder pair.

isForwarderFor(address,address).notice: Checks whether an account is as a meta-transaction forwarder for a signer account.

isTrustedForwarder(address).notice: Checks whether a forwarder is trusted.

userdoc.notice: Users can allow specific forwarders to forward meta-transactions on their behalf.
